related_questions.question:
My uncle's house is situated on a hill. It has very beautiful hilly green rice field scenery.    There is a (1) ... farm at the backyard. My uncle really loves and keeps the chicken well.
The house is not (2)..., but it is lovely and clean. I love staying there. This is the place
where my uncle's family spends most of their time together. It has three bedrooms, a living
room, a dining room, a (3) ..., and two bathrooms.
At the front, there is a living room. Next to this room, there is a dining room. My uncle's
bedroom is near the dining room. The bedroom is (4)... and warm. There is a kitchen and
two bathrooms at the back of the house.
Each room has some furniture. My uncle (5) ... the furniture properly. They are not
expensive, but he always keeps them free from dust. He does this because he wants to
make his house seen as the nicest place to live in.
a. arranges
b.
chicken
C. neat
d. big
kitchen
e.​

1. If I... (to study), I... (to pass) ... the exam    C. Studied - will study
A. Study - would study X
B. Study - will study
D. Studied - would have studied
2. If the sun ... (to shine), we... (to walk) into town
C. Shines - will shine
A. Shine - would shine
D. Shone - would have shone
B. Shine - will shine
(to see the doctor
3. If he ... (to have) a temperature, he
A. Have - will see
C. Had - will see
B. Has - will see
D. Having - will see
4. If you (go)... by bike more often, you (be/not).. so flabby
A Go - would not be
B. Went - would not be
C. Goes - would not be
D. Going would not be​

answers.answer:
Jawaban

1. If I STUDIED, I WOULD pass the exam.

2. If the sun shines, we will walk into town

3. If he has a temperature, he will see the doctor. (textnya qkira kira aja cz klimat g lngkap)

related_questions.question:
3. Ubah kata yang ada di dalam kurung sehingga menjadi conditional sentence type III yang benar!

“If we (know) about that earlier, we (not come) here.”
_
inappropriate answer will be reported, thank ya ~​

answers.answer:
Conditional Sentence Type 3 adalah suatu kondisi dimana suatu hal sudah tidak memungkinkan lagi untuk terjadi dikarenakan waktu kejadian sudah melampaui batas.

Contohnya : If you had remembered to invite me, I would have attended your party.

Rumus Conditional Sentence Type 3 :

If + Past Perfect + Would + Have + Past Participle.

Perubahan kata diatas menjadi Conditional Sentence Type 3 adalah :

If we had Known about that earlier, We Would'nt Have Come here.

related_questions.question: Jelaskan apa yang dimaksud dengan variabel?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Variabel atau peubah dapat mengacu pada: Variabel (matematika), sebuah simbol yang melambangkan suatu kuantitas dalam suatu ekspresi matematika, serta sering digunakan dalam berbagai bidang ilmu pengetahuan. Variabel (ilmu komputer), suatu nama simbolis yang memiliki nilai dan nilainya bisa diubah-ubah

Jawaban:

Variabel merupakan salah satu komponen penting yang dibutuhkan peneliti dalam sebuah penelitian. Variabel mencakup segala sesuatu yang ditetapkan untuk mendapatkan informasi mengenai hal tersebut hingga bisa ditarik kesimpulannya.

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu

Jawaban:

1.We'll go shopping if we had the time

2.liza might bring an umbrella if she knew it was going to rain

3.i will be in Paris soon, I want to see the Eiffel Tower

(sigh... yg nomer 3nya gk yakin aku:" )
